note:
Former historian, current indexer. She/her, cis. Cats, nature, crafts, sci fi/fantasy. Chicago parent. GenX. West Coast ex-pat.
 FYI if your bio is blank & you have no posts I probably won’t approve your follow request. Toss up a few words & post a cat pic or something & try again.
 If you’re looking for an indexer for your scholarly book, DM me. Areas of particular expertise include Latin America & Spain, Indigenous, environmental history & studies, borderlands, US history, digital culture.
